definition: exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
to be adjusted to uniformity (usually of weights and measures) (idiom)

sentences.english: Surface conduit and support should be fixed strongly and arranged into order.
sentences.chinese: 明配管及其支架應平滑牢固，排列整齊。

sentences.english: The books are in orderly rows on the shelves.
sentences.chinese: 書整齊有序地排列在書架上。

sentences.english: There are four hundred neatly marked graves somewhere in Sicily.
sentences.chinese: 在西西里，有四百個整齊排列的墳墓。

sentences.english: House of Mountaineers stacks the firewood, neat and clean.
sentences.chinese: 山民房子邊堆起的柴薪，整齊而清潔。

sentences.english: We put the newspapers in neat piles on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 我們在地板上把報紙整齊地疊起來。

sentences.english: Her teeth are very regular and white.
Everything you need bundled into one simple, tidy, portable package.
sentences.chinese: 你需要的一切捆綁成一個簡單，整齊，便攜包。

sentences.english: I disposed of the dictionaries in convenient and quickly accessible places .
sentences.chinese: 我把字典整齊地放在便於迅速拿到的地方。

sentences.english: Automatic rectify deviation control a end surface regularity.
sentences.chinese: 自動糾偏控制一個端面的整齊度。

sentences.english: As for teeth, the candidate with the straightest, wins the election.
sentences.chinese: 在牙齒方面，牙齒最整齊的候選人贏出大選。

sentences.english: How can you contrive to write so even?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼寫得那麼整齊來着？

sentences.english: The first thing to catch your sight is the neatly arranged desks in the middle.
sentences.chinese: 首先映入眼簾的是中間排列整齊的書桌。

sentences.english: The child's dress is neatly gathered at the neck.
sentences.chinese: 孩子的衣服在領口處打着整齊的皺褶。

sentences.english: The carpenter put the edges of the boards in line.
sentences.chinese: 木匠把木板挨邊放整齊。

definition: as one wishes/according to one's wishes/at will/voluntary/conscious
to arrange/to exhibit/to move to and fro/a pendulum
to pay particular attention to/carefully selected for quality/tastefully chosen
